descriptor.name: Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana (Kishore) Assignment
descriptor.short_desc: Assignment: Guide an entrepreneur through the PMMY Kishore loan application and document the process.
descriptor.long_desc:
Assignment Overview:
This assignment requires you to apply your knowledge of the Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana (Kishore) by simulating or assisting an entrepreneur in applying for a Kishore loan. Document each step, from eligibility check to application submission and loan disbursement.

  1. Task:
    Guide a real or hypothetical entrepreneur through the Kishore loan application process, ensuring all requirements are met.
  2. Documentation:
    Record the steps, challenges, and solutions. Include forms or screenshots if possible.
  3. Reflection:
    Write a brief reflection on the importance of business loans for MSMEs and what you learned from this assignment.

Why Complete This Assignment:

  • Reinforce your practical knowledge of PMMY Kishore procedures.
  • Develop the ability to assist others in accessing business finance.
  • Prepare for real-world scenarios as a financial advisor or business consultant.

descriptor.name: Haqdarshak
descriptor.short_desc: A social enterprise connecting citizens with their eligible government welfare schemes.
descriptor.long_desc: Haqdarshak is a tech platform that bridges the information and access gap between citizens and social protection services. We use an assisted-tech model with trained agents to provide last-mile support for discovering and applying for government and private welfare schemes.
